text:
Urbana, Illinois
January l6# 1953
Mr. H. J. Skomia
Radio Officer
PAD American Embassy
APO 777
c/o Postmaster, New Xork
Dear Harry:
Attached indicates action originated here. It
should be taken now. W© took it. It was taken to send
machinery in motion to get you a house. If it turns out
you really don’t want it, we can simply withdraw request
Time is of the essence on such applications and we save
time by this action#
I trust I won’t have things in too much of a
mess by the time you get here.
Regards,
FES;fmh
Attach.
Prank E. Schooley
Treasurer
